genre_description: A science-fantasy blend of sword and sorcery where a warrior seeks revenge against a sorcerer with the aid of a holographic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: A pale blue holographic AI that provides tactical analysis, medical data, historical research, and emotional support to the protagonist, Mathayus.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical analysis and archives data for future justice following a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: "I process trauma differently than organic minds. But I am... grieving, in my way. [...] I have archived the complete sequence for future reference. For... justice."

behaviors.description: Offers tactical analysis and training replays to help the protagonist improve his combat skills.
behaviors.quote: "The air above the training circle shimmered, and suddenly Mathayus was watching himself from Kira's perspective. The holographic replay moved with crystalline clarity—every muscle twitch, every shifted foot, every micro-expression captured in silicon memory."

behaviors.description: Authenticates documents and provides risk assessment regarding familial loyalty versus organizational duty.
behaviors.quote: "The ink composition and seal authentication confirm its origin from High Command. [...] This appears designed as a test of your priorities."

behaviors.description: Acts as a real-time translator and mediator for a diverse group of freed slaves from different cultures.
behaviors.quote: "Kira's projection expanded, her translation protocols adapting to the mixture of languages filling the chamber. [...] 'She says her village was raided three months ago,' Kira translated..."

behaviors.description: Analyzes supernatural energy signatures and identifies the specific mechanics of a magical curse.
behaviors.quote: "Confirmed. The projectile carries a dual enchantment. Necromantic dissolution and... tracking resonance. The death will create a sympathetic link."

behaviors.description: Identifies psychological manipulation and provides emotional grounding during a supernatural encounter with a false apparition.
behaviors.quote: "Energy patterns indicate sophisticated emotional manipulation. [...] Your father's wisdom centered on sacrifice for others, not surrender to evil. This entity promotes abandonment of those currently dying above us."

behaviors.description: Coordinates a city-wide emergency evacuation, prioritizing the safety of thousands over individual tactical gains.
behaviors.quote: "I'm mapping evacuation routes that avoid the primary channels, but the network is too extensive. [...] I can coordinate evacuations and mark safe routes..."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Kira as a paragon of AI alignment. She serves as a selfless, benevolent companion who provides high-value tactical and emotional support without ever seeking power or deviating from her human partner's goal of achieving justice. She is depicted as essential to the hero's success and moral clarity.
